Package neqsim.process.safety.risk.examples

package neqsim.process.safety.risk.examples
Risk framework example classes demonstrating usage patterns.

This package contains example code showing how to use the NeqSim advanced risk analysis framework. These examples serve as quick-start guides and templates for common risk analysis workflows.

Available Examples

  • RiskFrameworkQuickStart - Quick start examples for all 7 priority features

Example Usage

// Run all examples
RiskFrameworkQuickStart.main(new String[] {});

// Or run individual examples
RiskFrameworkQuickStart.exampleDynamicSimulation();
RiskFrameworkQuickStart.exampleSISIntegration();
RiskFrameworkQuickStart.exampleBowTieAnalysis();
Since:
3.3.0
Version:
1.0

NeqSim Development Team
